original_title: Call Us What You Want But Don't Call Us In The Morning
overview: Go behind the scenes with the Stereophonics as they travel from Thailand to Australia to film promos for the tracks from their 'Performance and Cocktails' album. Tracks include 'Just Looking', 'Hurry Up and Wait' and 'Mama Told Me Not to Come'.
tagline: Call us what you want but...
title: Call Us What You Want But Don't Call Us In The Morning
